part_name:
Hello! I'm RMMaturity bot, I will assess risk management maturity level in your company.

I will ask you a lot of questions about your organization and based on your answers give you a result

blocks.block_name: Let's start from "General information about company"

questions.text: Please, indicate the country of your organisation headquarter
Please, indicate the city of your organisation headquarter
Please, indicate the industry in which your organization operates

Далее Вам будет предложено 36 вопросов, для каждого вопроса будет 3 варианта ответа, каждый вариант это утверждение. Вам необходимо выбрать утверждение, которое наиболее соответствует вашей компании! Если вы готовы, запаситесь терпением и нажмите "Продолжить". Помните, вы можете продолжить отвечать на вопросы в любой момент, с любого устройства, не торопитесь, чем более точную информацию вы предоставите нам, тем более точную информацию вы получите

part_name: Part A: Risk-based decision making and integration of risk management into business processes

blocks.block_name: Block 1: Integration risk management into planning and budgeting

questions.text:
Integration into planning and budgeting.

Statement 1:

Risks related to the achievement of strategic goals and the organization's budget are not analyzed or analyzed after the fact.

Statement 2:

The results of the analysis of risks associated with the achievement of strategic goals and the organization's budget are considered by the management when setting goals forming the budget, but this procedure is not regulated.

Statement 3:

Risk management tools are integrated directly into planning and budgeting processes. Goals, objectives and annual budget are formed based on risk analysis.

The impact of risks on achieving the Goal.

Statement 1:

Changes in strategic objectives and budgets are implemented after the implementation of risks, rather than preventively.

Statement 2:

The organization has agreed on the frequency of the risk analysis procedure. Risk analysis is initiated and carried out on time, but this procedure is not directly connected with the actualization of strategic goals and budgets.

Statement 3:

Risk analysis directly affects the revision of strategic goals and budgets of the company

Risk appetite

Statement 1:

The company does not define an approach to establishing a risk appetite (tolerance to risks).

Statement 2:

The company plans to establish a risk-appetite for the most significant risks in the nearest future.

Statement 3:

The company has a risk-appetite, which is approved in the form of an independent document by the board of directors.
